channel.title: MoparClassic
channel.description:
What happend to it? Is people still working on it? Cause I just got it up and running and I'm amazed! The thing is I want to learn some java by working with that base. Is that a bad idea?
And how come no-one is using MoparClassic as a base?
Bugs (found atm): - No skulling appears when attacking someone in wildy - Fixed

item.title: MoparClassic
item.dc:creator: @Wife_Beater Wife Beater
item.description:
@Wife_Beater wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:7, topic:457349”][quote author=Chewar link=topic=560277.msg4092125#msg4092125 date=1346480441]

[quote]You’re working off the wrong branch… You should be using pre-beta.
[/quote]

I dont get… I think I am working from the pre-beta? This is where i got the source:

https://github.com/Lothy/MoparClassic/tree/pre-beta
[/quote]Then where are you getting this 8 month’s from?

The last commit was 22 days ago and the last issue opened was 16 days ago.[/quote]

Dude its dead…

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Chewar, post:4, topic:457349”]Thanks for the answers guys.

@CodeForFame, GitHub seems dead, no one has posted anything for more than 8 month? :S Alright, I’ll still give it try tho.

@Latifundio - Are you working with MoparClassic atm? Thanks ill check that random movement out. If you are working with MoparClassic please send me a pm.[/quote]You’re working off the wrong branch… You should be using pre-beta.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Chewar wrote:

Thanks for the answers guys.

@CodeForFame, GitHub seems dead, no one has posted anything for more than 8 month? :S Alright, I’ll still give it try tho.

@Latifundio - Are you working with MoparClassic atm? Thanks ill check that random movement out. If you are working with MoparClassic please send me a pm.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Not skull really? thats a nice one

…btw i think this is the npc random movement stuff (Npc.java)

if (now - lastMovement > 2200) { lastMovement = now; int rand = DataConversions.random(0, 1); if (!isBusy() && finishedPath() && rand == 1 && !this.isRemoved()) { int newX = DataConversions.random(loc.minX(), loc.maxX()); int newY = DataConversions.random(loc.minY(), loc.maxY()); super.setPath(new Path(getX(), getY(), newX, newY)); } }

if you run from an aggressive npc it might just move to a random direction instead of chasing you (eventually will but looks bad).

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Chewar, post:1, topic:457349”]What happend to it? Is people still working on it?
Cause I just got it up and running and I’m amazed! The thing is I want to learn some java by working with that base. Is that a bad idea?

And how come no-one is using MoparClassic as a base?

EDIT:
Alright since no answer was given I’m just gonna try to run my own race here… *

Bugs (found atm):

  • No skulling appears when attacking someone in wildy (fix in progress)…[/quote]Bugs should be reported on GitHub and fixes should be made there as well.

Also, AFAIK there are several people using it…

Oh, and using any type of private server to learn Java is just a bad idea.

Read full topic
